## Summary

Briefly describe the feature or improvement you are proposing.

## Motivation

Explain the problem this feature solves or the value it adds.

## Proposed Solution

Describe the behavior, API, or UX you would like to see.

## Alternatives Considered

List any alternative approaches you have tried or considered.

## Additional Context

Add context, related issues, or sketches that help illustrate the request.
